meaningMnemonic: This <radical>tsunami</radical> is the <radical>reason</radical> we have so much <kanji>oil</kanji> now. The tsunami moved a bunch of earth out of the way, so now it’s really easy to dig for oil. Thanks tsunami!
readingMnemonic: Now that <kanji>oil</kanji> is so abundant, everyone lives in <reading>yu</reading>rts (ゆ). They're light and mobile, so people can just move from oil well to oil well, collecting oil.
